title: THE BODY IN THE SNOWDRIFT
description: Detective Logico received a letter in the mail from a monastery. Brother Brownstone wanted to speak to him about something of grave importance. But when Logico got to the monastery, Brother Brownstone had been killed!

suspects.name: FATHER MANGO
suspects.description: Father Mango could have enjoyed being a priest in the church for years. They just had one rule: don't get caught murdering people. Now, he was confined to this monastery.

suspects.name: DEACON VERDIGRIS
suspects.description: A deacon of the church. She handles the parishioners' donations and, sometimes, their secrets.

suspects.name: SISTER LAPIS
suspects.description: A nun who travels the world, doing God's work on His dime. Her habit is cashmere, and her habit is spending.

suspects.name: BROTHER BROWNSTONE
suspects.description: Brother Brownstone's brother, who is not a brother of the church, just Brownstone's.

weapons.name: A STRING OF PRAYER BEADS
weapons.description: Ivory prayer beads covered with tiny engraved symbols.

weapons.name: A PRAYER CANDLE
weapons.description: If you were praying that some-body died, your wish came true.

weapons.name: SACRAMENTAL WINE
weapons.description: A great way to show your de-votion is to drink a lot of this holy red wine.

weapons.name: A BOTTLE OF SACRED OIL
weapons.description: It's not, like, massage oil. It's petroleum oil. But it's still sacred.

locations.name: THE COURTYARD
locations.description: There's a snowdrift there right now, but usually it's pretty nice.

locations.name: THE FORBIDDEN LIBRARY
locations.description: Where they store the books the monks aren't allowed to read.

locations.name: THE CHAPEL
locations.description: You can hear the monks praying well and singing poorly.

locations.name: THE CLIFFS
locations.description: Why do people keep building on the side of cliffs? And al-ways over jagged rocks?

clues: Whoever would kill out of madness was right-handed.
The person with a bottle of sacred oil wanted to kill to avenge their father. It was their father's sacred oil, you see.
A Taurus was loving the sacramental wine. Maybe too much.
The prayer beads were not allowed outside, and nobody broke that rule.
Deacon Verdigris was found wandering outdoors.
A weapon covered in tiny engraved symbols was brought by the person who had a motive to kill for religious reasons.
The suspect who was on the cliffs had light brown eyes.
The second tallest suspect was listening to the sounds of off-key singing.
The body was found in a snowdrift.
